Reviews.Title: pleased about my new phone
Reviews.Author: Clayton Harrigan "C & D"
Reviews.Content: I just would like to expressed my relieved and graditude, for my new Blackberry 8520 Curve cell phone,i recieved from this vendor, through Amazon, the item came new, and everything were perfect with the phone, just as it had been stated in the advertisement, it arrived the exact time, their said it would too, why the relieve, because i read of other people getting wrong deals, but not me, i got precisely what i paid for,ooh and i loved the purple color too, thanks once again for your honesty in this sale, WIREOVIA and AMAZON, nice transtaction, I loved my new phone!!!!!!.

Reviews.Title: Works in Colombia
Reviews.Author: EWG
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone as a gift for a friend in Colombia, it works great and she is happy and satisfied

Reviews.Title: Good phone to be used in Venezuela
Reviews.Author: Hanoi
Reviews.Content: I Bought it as a christmas gift to be used in Venezuela. My aunt iOS so happy with her new cell phone. It can be used with moviestar and works very well. The phone arrived on time, it is so pretty and new with all the accessories.

Reviews.Title: BLACKBERRY 8520 CURVE UNLOCKPHONE WITH 2MP DIGITAL CAMERA.QWERTY
Reviews.Author: mamala
Reviews.Content: excellent bb8520 curve unlock phone the color is great & the price was right my daughter gets plenty of compliments @ her univerisity & now she loves bb & wants me to buy her the new bb10.(lol) THANKS!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these phones and both came as new in excellent condition and worked perfectly. Would buy again as price is very good. happy i took the chance to buy. recommend this buy

Reviews.Title: Blackberry 8520 Curve
Reviews.Author: Denisse
Reviews.Content: es malo no gasten sus dolares en esto, compren  en otra cosa en venezuela este telef no funciona bien .

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: Omar
Reviews.Content: Great costumer service for me, Great device, I will recomend with my friends, I liked the package, color and accesories too.

Reviews.Title: Unlocked Phone
Reviews.Author: Crystal Sutton
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for a friend and it worked for about five months, she tried to download an app and the phone locked up.  Went online to buy a unlock code for it and it didn't work.  Emailed the company who I purchased the phone from through Amazon and they were not helpful and said there was nothing they could do.  My friend's cell phone provider T-Mobile said because it was a Rogers phone they couldn't do anything for me either.  So the phone is useless!!!!  No one seems to be able to help.  I would not recommend buying a phone online.  I am very disappointed with this phone and the company I purchased it from.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry 8520 Curve
Reviews.Author: Alejandro González
Reviews.Content: El celular llego en buenas condiciones y sin problemas. Muy bueno el producto. Gracias por el envio oportuno del aparato.

Reviews.Title: Great but with dead battery
Reviews.Author: PaMM70
Reviews.Content: After one month of buying this cellphone i recieved it on my home country, Ecuador, and it was perfect exept for one thing, the battery.The battery had a failure and didn't charged, so i got a new one for about 20 bucks on a store. You should check if the cell works before sending it!.

Reviews.Title: Cute phone
Reviews.Author: Carebear
Reviews.Content: I like the purple but not sure if I should have went with traditional black or not. Works well so far, just got it today, new in sealed box, service is a bit worse than my last phone (pantech at&t;). in perfect condition. Seems to be a good phone.

Reviews.Title: I'm upset
Reviews.Author: EDISSON SALAZAR
Reviews.Content: NOT REALLY HAPPENED WITH THIS PRODUCT BUT NEVER LLEGUO ME, I DID THIS PURCHASE AND TRULY lost money because the package did not reach me ... It is unfortunate

Reviews.Title: It wouldn't charge!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Borgan
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of this phones, the first one got stolen which was very sad! So i decided to buy a second one, the second one seemed to be ok but it would not charge! So its pretty useless! I'm in another country and it cannot get fixed so it was a waste of my money and time!Will never buy a phone online again!

Reviews.Title: if you are out country you will be stole :(
Reviews.Author: cesar jaramillo
Reviews.Content: Hello friends from amazon, the phone came in good condition, brought their accessories and all the others, I would like to report and make clear is that I feel the shops to see that the product will be sent to a virtual locker, I suppose that they assume that goes to another country and send a product that does not work in my case the blackberry not charging, I'm from venezuela and the cost of sending it again It is very high , I am very disappointed I hope this will be corroborate.

Reviews.Title: Not What I expected
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This phone was not what I had expected. As advertised it says UNLOCKED phone. How there is not a slot for the SIM card. Therefore I am unable to use it. What is the point of having a pretty phone that I cannot use. Also they took forever to even send it.

Reviews.Title: Purple Passion
Reviews.Author: YeeYee
Reviews.Content: The phone is okay. Keys are too small for my hands. The battery life is terrible, I have to keep switching back to my old phone to saty up & running. I wish I had b ought a slide-out keyboard type phone instead. For the money...disappointed!

Reviews.Title: SO FAR SO GOOD...!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I JUST RECEIVED THIS PHONE AND I REALLY LOVE IT. I CAN DO EVERYTHING ON THIS PHONE. ITS AWESOME. THE ONLY DOWNSIDE I SEE SO FAR IS THE BATTERY LIFE. I THINK THAT IT COULD B MUCH BETTER. BUT OVERALL I LOVE THIS PHONE. WITH THE BLACKBERRY INTERNET I HAVE ACCESS TO MY FAVORITE APPS LIKE KINDLE(I LOVE TO READ), PANDORA RADIO, FACEBOOK, AND AIM MAIL. I LOVE THIS PHONE. ITS PURPLE, WHICH IS MY FAVORITE COLOR. IT HAS ABOUT EVERYTHING YOU'LL NEED IN A PHONE FROM TESTING, TALKING, AND INTERNET BROWSING. SO FAR I AM ENJOYING MY PURPLEBERRY CURVE. JUST LOVE IT!!!P.S - IN ORDER TO GET THE TOTAL EXPERIENCE OF YOUR BLACKBERRY YOU MUST SIGN UP FOR BLACKBERRY INTERNET SERVICE WITH YOUR MOBILE SERVICE PROVIDER. WITH T-MOBILE ITS LIKE $10 MORE THAN YOUR ORIGINAL SERVICE PLAN BUT WELL WORTH IT.)WITH THIS PHONE YOU WILL GET THE TOTAL EXPERIENCE OF A SMART PHONE. THIS PHONE IS FOR THOSE OF YOU WHO DONT WANT TO GET CAUGHT IN THE IPHONE HYPE. BLACKBERRY'S WILL ALWAYS BE IN STYLE. :)

Reviews.Title: defect the cellular
Reviews.Author: eibys gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Good days i made the purchase of the blackberry 8520 cellular by here and it was not bad grasps with no carrier signal and have a warranty like q m indicating that do i do to resolve the problem or i change to another

Reviews.Title: POOR QUALITY
Reviews.Author: VIBRANT
Reviews.Content: They are all different sizes and didn't fit right. Didn't like the quality. Still trying to give them away, but no one wants them... lol
